issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: The idea is to be able to use the same warehouse for multiple clusters in the cloud use cases. This scenario is not currently supported by WM.
fields.summary: add RP namespacing to workload management

ATTACHMENT ID: 12945495 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build
Fixed some bugs, updated sysdb views more, fixed the sysdb version in the test file.
some minor comments. mostly looks good.Â

Addressed the feedback, fixed a bug. Also fixed some old issue that I noticed while fixing the bug - having the child pools take the entire capacity of the parent (i.e. 1.0) should be allowed. Fixed that too.
